content: sssiiimmmpppllleee cccrrroooccchhheeettt cccooovvveeerrr this is the simplest of crochet hot water bottle covers which you can embellish to suit the hot water bottle cover measures approximately 36 cm 14 inches by 23 cm 9 inches including the neck the bottom edge is left open and i have secured it with a crochet cord but buttons or ties would work equally well different yarns and decorations will produce very different results yarn 100g cheap variegated yarn abbreviations notions scraps of contrasting yarn or 2-3 chain chain buttons half_double_crochet half_double_crochet hook 6 5mm slip_stitch slip_stitch skill intermediate gauge 4 inches = 10 sts and 8 row of half_double_crochet hot water bottle cover the hot water bottle is worked in rounds starting at the neck the first 9 rounds are shown in the diagram at the bottom of the document base chain chain 8 round 1 chain 3 count as first st half_double_crochet into 4rd chain from hook twice half_double_crochet into next 6 chain 5 half_double_crochet into last chain working down the other side of the chains half_double_crochet in next 6 chain 2 half_double_crochet into next chain slip_stitch into top of 1st st - 22 stitches round 2 chain 3 count as first st half_double_crochet into each st round slip_stitch into top of 1st st 22 stitches round 3 chain 3 count as first st half_double_crochet into next 10 sts 2 half_double_crochet into next st half_double_crochet into next 10 sts half_double_crochet into top of the 1st st of previous round slip_stitch into top of 1st st of this round 24 stitches sssiiimmmpppllleee cccrrroooccchhheeettt cccooovvveeerrr round 4 and 5 chain 3 count as 1st st half_double_crochet into each st round slip_stitch into top of 1st st 24 stitches round 6 chain 3 count as 1st st *2 half_double_crochet into next st half_double_crochet into next st* repeat from * - * round slip_stitch into top of 1st st 36 stitches round 7 and 8 chain 3 count as 1st st half_double_crochet into each st round slip_stitch into top of 1st st 36 stitches round 9 chain 3 count as 1st st *half_double_crochet into next 2 sts 2 half_double_crochet into next st* repeat from * - * round half_double_crochet into top of the 1st st of previous round slip_stitch into top of 1st st 48 stitches row 10 - 25 repeat round 9 fasten_off and weave in ends here i have secured the open bottom edge of the cover by threading a 75 cm 30 inch chain through the last row of stitches i have also placed a similar chain about a third from the top of the cover and added a crochet flower chain 3 chain half_double_crochet
